name: radikal.ru - ads cleaner
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("radikal.ru")
{
#MarketGidComposite2117, #right_ban, #aswift_0_anchor, #MainDivAdminTop,
DIV[style="position: fixed; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 10; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: rgb(0, 0, 0) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; opacity: 0.65; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-size: 12px;"][margin_top_da="0"][margin_bottom_da="0"][margin_left_da="0"][margin_right_da="0"][padding_top_da="0"][padding_bottom_da="0"][padding_left_da="0"][padding_right_da="0"][font_size_da="12"],
DIV[style="z-index: 100000; top: 0px; left: 0px; width: 100%; height: 100%; padding: 0px; -moz-text-size-adjust: none; position: fixed;"],
DIV[style="width: 320px; height: 260px; margin-top: 10px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 10px; margin-bottom: 0px; overflow: hidden;"],
DIV[style="width: 325px; height: 260px; margin-top: 10px; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 10px; margin-bottom: 0px; overflow: hidden;"],
DIV[style="position: fixed; top: 0px; cursor: pointer; bottom: 0px; right: 0px; left: 0px; z-index: 2; background: transparent url(\"/Content/AdmiralX/img/braaafdfdfggdf.jpg\") no-repeat scroll center top; opacity: 1;"],
DIV[style="width: 300px; height: 250px; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; display: inline-block;"],
DIV.overadp-da, #lightning123, .banerBottom, .banerTop, .base-page_left-side,
#block_2220, #ad_ph_1, #block_2542, .PC_Links_Block,
.logo, #top_ban, #right_ban2, #amsb_panel, #right_ban21, #right_ban0, #right_ban22,
#left_ban2, #left_ban, #imgtd, IMG[width="300px"][height="20px"],
INS[style="display:inline-table;border:none;height:90px;margin:0;padding:0;position:relative;visibility:visible;width:728px"],
A[href="http://www.visaciti.ru"], A[href="http://www.multivizac.ru/"],
#amflash, .vcenter1, .bottomcontr, iframe, #neptun_ad
{display:none !important;}
}
